msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
* Fix for Flex Builder JUnit tests.
Changed the deleted Map used in validateCompilationUnits() and
some of it's helper methods from <String, Source> to <QName,
Source>.  This allows us to track when a definition is deleted
from one SWC in the library path and then added by another SWC in
the library path.  All the definitions dependant on the definition
need to be recompiled and we were missing this before.
Specifically, the Flex Builder JUnit tests were switching from
airglobal.swc to playerglobal.swc midstream.  As a result, we
weren't recompiling classes that depended on
flash.display.DisplayObjectContainer, because it looked like it

Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
* Some changes necessary to get the improved SWC cache working in Flex
Builder 4 and some potential bug fixes.
Modified link() to pass the file name into SwcDynamicArchive's
constructor even when using an OuputStream, so the file name can
be used as a cache key.
Added refreshLastModified() so Flex Builder can update the
timestamp in the SWC cache after writing it's OutputStream to the
Modified postRun() to use the value returned from
ResourceContainer.addResource() instead of the value passed in,
because it could be different.  This might fix SDK-18493 and
Modified readCompilationUnit() to also use the value returned from
Modified updateDependentLastModifiedTimes() to check for a null
Added path param to OutputStream based constructor to be used as a
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
* This change makes the command compiler more consistent with Flex
Builder.  Sadly, the compiler was working as speced, but Flex
Builder designed their path resolution differently and the doc team
documented how Flex Builder worked, so customers thought the command
line compiler was broken.  Most people don't like how the command
line compiler was resolving paths with a leading slash, so this
should make most people happy.  It has the potential to break some
Flex 3- apps.  For example, if an application had the following:
Now the first one wins, even for components under the src2
Modified to put new SourcePath instances into the thread local
Removed special handling for paths with a leading slash.
Improved SwcNotExported message and added ArchiveFileException
